p: There was a linear reduction in the C16:0 ( P = 0.049), C16:1 cisâ€“9 ( P = 0.046), C18: 1 ( P <0.001) and MUFA (P = 0.005) contents, whereas C14:0 had a quadratic increase ( P = 0.049) in the salted and sun-dried meat from young Nellore bulls supplemented with condensed tannin extract ( Table 3).
